section.title: reject codes master list of Reject Codes
section.para: Reject Codes provide a means for labeling purchased Items when and if they are returned to the Vendor who supplied them. A Reject Code explains why an Item is being returned. To access the master list of Reject Codes, select the "Reject Codes" option. The following screen will appear:
The "Reject Codes" screen displays information on all existing Reject Codes, including Reject Code and Reject Code description.
